column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////They no longer serve bread and butter with the tapas and essential part of tapas
column2: take away one star. The tortilla was all burnt brown on the bottom and it was served warm not chilled
column3: take away another star. The goat cheese with tomato sauce had no taste at all
column4: minus another star. The overall experience was weak minus a star. The dates with bacon got them the one star they earned. Not going back for a while
column5: till they improve their game. Have been eating there since the mid 90s
column6: so I remember when it supposed to be like!
